channel.title: AAD
channel.description: A Frontend Developer with 4 years of professional experiences in various industries using ReactJS and NextJS.

item.title: React - Geting Start
item.description: React and Vue are some of the most popular front end frameworks that makes the web application becomes Single Page Application (SPA). Those frameworks using components approach for building UI for web application. So, it is necessary to have some kind of temporary data store for each component that can store any value and update the UI and content based on the value stored.
item.author: Muhamad Amir Azmi
